statements: SELECT sensor_name, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_name, vibration FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, temperature, status FROM sensor_data WHERE vibration > 0.5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%temperature%' AND vibration < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, vibration, status FROM sensor_data WHERE status = true ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, vibration FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor1' OR sensor_name = 'Sensor2' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND (vibration < 0.3 OR status = true) ORDER BY temperature DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, value FROM measurements
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location_id, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM measurements WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM measurements GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS measurement_count FROM sensors JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor'
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_date FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%floor%'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%Laboratory%' AND sensor_type = 'Humidity';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_date FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_type = 'Carbon Monoxide' ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' AND installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, description FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, type FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, type, status FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 100;
SELECT sensor_name, location, type, status FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Factory';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_type, description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type IN ('Calibration', 'Repair') AND status = true

SELECT sensor_id, date_installed, last_maintenance_date FROM sensor_history WHERE date_installed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_data.timestamp, reading FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE reading < 20 ORDER BY sensor_data.timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT reading_value, reading_time FROM Readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT component_name, location FROM Components WHERE component_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Predictions WHERE prediction_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, reading_value AS value FROM Readings WHERE reading_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT component_name FROM Components WHERE location LIKE '%Room';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
